subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Mario Götze broke a scoreless tie in the 113th minute to give Germany its fourth World Cup title, consigning Lionel Messi and Argentina to defeat and setting off celebrations in Brazil.
snippet: Mario Götze broke a scoreless tie in the 113th minute to give Germany its fourth World Cup title, consigning Lionel Messi and Argentina to defeat and setting off celebrations in Brazil.
